name: The Amazing Awakening of The Overpowered Genius
name_original: The Amazing Awakening of The Overpowered Genius
description:
Short ruby (with GOSU gem) game made in a academic Game Jam (4 days without knowledge on the technology).  It was ranked second.

Realised by the U team composed of 5 students in 2018.

The members :

Jarno Baeijs

Thomas De Nicolas

Hydriss Ruet

Emile Calixte

Guillaume Raimundo

Special thanks to the University Institute of Technology 2 of Grenoble who organize this event and to Victor Marion for making lots of sound.

Can be played without ruby and Gosu.

You control the character with Z Q S D. 

You can view the map by pressing M. 

You attack with J, use second item with K and the latest with L. 

To recover the item find press E.
